subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: An agreement was reached with a family scheduled to have a bar mitzvah at Yankee Stadium on the day the Yankees want to host a boxing match between Yuri Foreman and Miguel Cotto.
snippet: An agreement was reached with a family scheduled to have a bar mitzvah at Yankee Stadium on the day the Yankees want to host a boxing match between Yuri Foreman and Miguel Cotto.
